name: GPT Repository Access
description: Vecto Pilot AI (GPT-5) plans → diffs → commits/PRs. Tokens stay in the browser.
longDescription: Unified SDK • GPT-5. The model plans, generates clean unified diffs, and opens PRs. Browser holds your GitHub token (PAT/Device Flow). Optional local-Repl FS + exec via experimental APIs. Diff viewer and job logs included.
